title: Indian tech startups raise a record $74 bn from PE/VC firms in 2021: Report - Business Standard
content: Indian tech startups raise a record $74 bn from PE/VC firms in 2021: Report  Business Standard
description: 'E-commerce, consumer platforms, and IT services sectors were favorites among investors, recording 56% of total deal value in 2021,' says 'India Investments Pulse' report by Praxis Global Alliance
